content.question: Answer the following question(s) in English unless the question specifically asks you to provide Latin words. Identify Pliny the Younger’s motivation for agreeing to the recipient’s request, as described in lines 2-4 (nam...propositam).

frqParts.text: Answer the following question(s) in English unless the question specifically asks you to provide Latin words. Identify Pliny the Younger’s motivation for agreeing to the recipient’s request, as described in lines 2-4 (nam...propositam).

unit.text: 2: Pliny's Letters: Eruption of Mt. Vesuvius
